text: Dušan Jovanović (1 October 1939 — 31 December 2020) was a Slovene theatre director, playwright and essayist. He was known for his experimental satirical theatre. In 2005, he became president of the Prešeren Foundation. Jovanović died on 31 December 2020 at aged 81.Umrl je dramatik in režiser Dušan Jovanović ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Theatre directors Category:Slovenian playwrights Category:Yugoslavian essayists
title: Dušan Jovanović (theatre director)
